snippet: Southampton manager Claude Puel has ruled out selling either of his first-choice centre backs in the January transfer window, shooting down media reports that the club could cash in on Jose Fonte or Virgil van Dijk....
lead_paragraph: Southampton manager Claude Puel has ruled out selling either of his first-choice centre backs in the January transfer window, shooting down media reports that the club could cash in on Jose Fonte or Virgil van Dijk.

headline.main: Saints' Puel Rules Out January Sales of Key Defenders
headline.print_headline: Saints' Puel Rules Out January Sales of Key Defenders
